body: The following is what I encountered: 1.  add **[Surface Outside Face Incident Solar Radiation Rate per Area [W/m2]](http://bigladdersoftware.com/epx/docs/8-7/input-output-reference/group-thermal-zone-description-geometry.html#surface-outside-face-incident-solar-radiation-rate-per-area-wm2)** output variable: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/KABHGMdqTOORe8EiYhedwj3EOHLdUZaqtZL7wn6mvi7m*JEe2Bh71Ck2QxZRB42lpnn-AUDgPEpt53lpbUNroEcsBaZ2vCqt/Image67.png) 2. This output variable is generated in the result file for each surface: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/KABHGMdqTOP4*5-5lj9b8Ctgj4zvNtxIR4-t6WtGIjHIaQLhWD1FdyfAt94zkz6CPLixMLTqit3hVZYThNawh1ib9PgePdPz/Image66.png) 3. However, the **readEPSrfResult** component cannot recognize this variable: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/KABHGMdqTONZhHoTmWaRVOuN3M65lscrnOwYkLT-VCoXxirSAEyOLYVY3wudBz7p41ppLD0-nWixlm6mWFtMEnDoWAX41igy/Image68.png) 4. Nevertheless, for unknown strange reason, I'm unable to reproduce the above warning for this test file later, and it seems that this variable can be read by the **readEPSrfResult** component, for now.... [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/KABHGMdqTOPY1Wc2bL1LqNg30NZbKcw2aEFHn0qs2Zq8WbZ5l6qv5Z2WLE6gZLWbRRGJW2cWmix5--UHx9I6FMpZK8Whik-A/Image69.png) 5. I got the same warning in other GH file I'm testing which included the surface irradiance as output variable. So, I'm not sure why the warning is not consistent across different files ... Appreciate if you can kindly advise.
